Hi All,

Just got asked by a friend of mine for good books about the history of the 
ninja.  I have a few friends that practise ninpo and their suggestions have 
been pretty much dominated by the Stephen Hayes realm.

Anybody know of a good scholarly book on the subject -- or chapter in a book 
-- in either English or French?



Cheers,

Shannon
